scripts.get-main-changes: git checkout gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit
scripts.commit-deployment-changes: git add dist -f && git commit -m 'Deployment commit'
scripts.push-deployment-changes: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy: npm run -s get-main-changes && npm run -s commit-deployment-changes && npm run -s push-deployment-changes || git checkout main
